subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Sailboats and Sailing
Water Pollution
lead_paragraph: Organizers said they had no “Plan B” for the sailing events at the 2016 Games, despite an admission by an environmental official that it would be impossible to meet pledges to clean up Guanabara Bay.
snippet: Organizers said they had no “Plan B” for the sailing events at the 2016 Games, despite an admission by an environmental official that it would be impossible to meet pledges to clean up Guanabara Bay.
